name: Language Tags (Preview)
overview: This plugin automatically adds language tags to the media. (Preview Channel)
description: This plugin automatically scans the libraries and adds language tags to the media items. The languages are extracted from the audio tracks. Media types covered are movies, tv shows / series and collections. THIS IS THE PREVIEW CHANNEL - Use for testing new versions before they go to stable.

versions.changelog:
⚠️ PREVIEW RELEASE - For testing only\n\n- Bump version to 0.2.0.2
- Update build.yaml and manifest-preview.json for preview version 0.2.0.1-preview
- Fix: Remove -preview suffix from version in manifest to maintain Jellyfin compatibility
- Update build.yaml and manifest-preview.json for preview version 0.2.0.1-preview
- Bump version to 0.2.0.1
- Fix preview release workflow - use base version for build
- Add preview release support and manifest file
- Enhance release workflow: update version handling, target .NET 9.0, and improve changelog generation
- - Replace deprecated GetItemList() with QueryItems() API - Update TaskTriggerInfo to use TaskTriggerInfoType.IntervalTrigger
- - Update to target Jellyfin 10.11.0 - Migrate from .NET 8.0 to .NET 9.0
- Merge pull request #15 from Rand0mB0y:patch-1
- Update README.md to clarify external subtitles note and switched to PowerRename tool
- manual cleanup of the changelogs
- Update README.md
